sourcesContent: import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../modal/product.mode'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { baseUrl: string; http: HttpClient; loading: boolean = false; products: Product[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { this.baseUrl = baseUrl; this.http = http; this.getProduct(); } getProduct() { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'Product').subscribe(result => { this.products = result; this.loading = true; }, error => console.error(error)); } }
